jasperReport.name: report_revenue
jasperReport.queryString:
select q1.vn as vn ,q1.name_pt as name_pt ,q1.dx as dx ,q1.doctor as doctor ,q1.billing_receipt_number ,q1.visit_date ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.item_group ='1' then q1.price else 0 end) as drug1 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' then q1.price else 0 end) as proced1 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.item_group ='4' then q1.price else 0 end) as medical1 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.df like '%DF%' then q1.price else 0 end) as df1 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as lab1 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ชำระเงินเอง%' and q1.item_group <>'1' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' and q1.item_group ='4' and q1.df like '%DF%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as other1 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.item_group ='1' then q1.price else 0 end) as drug2 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' then q1.price else 0 end) as proced2 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.item_group ='4' then q1.price else 0 end) as medical2 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.df like '%DF%' then q1.price else 0 end) as df2 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as lab2 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%ปกส%' and q1.item_group <>'1' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' and q1.item_group ='4' and q1.df like '%DF%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as other2 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.item_group ='1' then q1.price else 0 end) as drug3 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' then q1.price else 0 end) as proced3 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.item_group ='4' then q1.price else 0 end) as medical3 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.df like '%DF%' then q1.price else 0 end) as df3 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as lab3 ,sum(case when q1.plan like '%บัตร30บาท%' and q1.item_group <>'1' and q1.subgroup like '%หัตถการ%' and q1.item_group ='4' and q1.df like '%DF%' and q1.item_group ='2' then q1.price else 0 end) as other3 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
from (select distinct t_visit.visit_vn as vn ,f_patient_prefix.patient_prefix_description || ' ' || t_patient.patient_firstname ||' '|| t_patient.patient_lastname AS name_pt ,t_visit.visit_dx as dx ,b_employee.employee_firstname ||' '|| b_employee.employee_lastname as doctor ,t_billing_receipt.billing_receipt_number as billing_receipt_number ,substr(t_visit.visit_begin_visit_time,1,10) as visit_date ,b_contract_plans.contract_plans_description as plan ,b_item_subgroup.f_item_group_id as item_group ,b_item_subgroup.item_subgroup_description as subgroup ,b_item.item_common_name as df ,t_order.order_qty as qty ,(t_order.order_price * t_order.order_qty) as price
from t_visit INNER JOIN t_patient ON t_patient.t_patient_id = t_visit.t_patient_id LEFT JOIN f_patient_prefix ON t_patient.f_patient_prefix_id=f_patient_prefix.f_patient_prefix_id INNER JOIN t_visit_service ON t_visit.t_visit_id = t_visit_service.t_visit_id INNER JOIN t_visit_payment ON t_visit.t_visit_id = t_visit_payment.t_visit_id INNER JOIN b_contract_plans ON t_visit_payment.b_contract_plans_id = b_contract_plans.b_contract_plans_id INNER JOIN b_employee ON t_visit_service.visit_service_staff_doctor = b_employee.b_employee_id INNER JOIN t_order ON t_visit.t_visit_id = t_order.t_visit_id INNER JOIN b_item ON t_order.b_item_id = b_item.b_item_id INNER JOIN b_item_subgroup ON b_item.b_item_subgroup_id = b_item_subgroup.b_item_subgroup_id INNER JOIN t_billing ON t_visit.t_visit_id = t_billing.t_visit_id LEFT JOIN t_billing_receipt ON t_billing.t_billing_id = t_billing_receipt.t_billing_id
where ((t_visit.f_visit_status_id <>'4') AND ((t_order.f_order_status_id <>'0') AND (t_order.f_order_status_id <> '3') ) and t_billing_receipt.billing_receipt_paid > 0 --รายการรับชำระจำนวนที่จ่ายต้อง >0 and substr(t_visit.visit_begin_visit_time,1,10) between $P{start_date} and $P{end_date} ) order by t_billing_receipt.billing_receipt_number) as q1
group by q1.vn ,q1.name_pt ,q1.dx ,q1.doctor ,q1.billing_receipt_number ,q1.visit_date

staticText.text: รายงานการตรวจรายได้จากคลินิกเครือข่าย

textField.textFieldExpression: "จากวันที่"+" "+ $P{start_date}.substring( 8, 10 )+ " "+(($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("01")?String.valueOf("มกราคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("02")?String.valueOf("กุมภาพันธ์"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("03")?String.valueOf("มีนาคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("04")?String.valueOf("เมษายน"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("05")?String.valueOf("พฤษภาคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("06")?String.valueOf("มิถุนายน"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("07")?String.valueOf("กรกฎาคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("08")?String.valueOf("สิงหาคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("09")?String.valueOf("กันยายน"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("10")?String.valueOf("ตุลาคม"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("11")?String.valueOf("พฤศจิกายน"):($P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("12")?String.valueOf("ธันวาคม"):$P{start_date}.substring( 5, 7 ))+ " "+$P{start_date}.substring( 0, 4 )+ " "+"ถึงวันที่"+" "+ $P{end_date}.substring( 8, 10 )+ " "+(($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("01")?String.valueOf("มกราคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("02")?String.valueOf("กุมภาพันธ์"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("03")?String.valueOf("มีนาคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("04")?String.valueOf("เมษายน"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("05")?String.valueOf("พฤษภาคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("06")?String.valueOf("มิถุนายน"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("07")?String.valueOf("กรกฎาคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("08")?String.valueOf("สิงหาคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("09")?String.valueOf("กันยายน"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("10")?String.valueOf("ตุลาคม"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("11")?String.valueOf("พฤศจิกายน"):($P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 )).equals("12")?String.valueOf("ธันวาคม"):$P{end_date}.substring( 5, 7 ))+ " "+$P{end_date}.substring( 0, 4 )

staticText.text: เลขที่ใบยา
ชื่อ - นามสกุล
แพทย์ผู้ตรวจ
เลขที่ใบเสร็จ
